caption: This photograph captures a candid street scene featuring four men engaging in an animated conversation in an urban setting. The men are fashionably dressed in styles suggestive of the 1970s or 1980s: three of them wear distinctive hats adorned with checkered and geometric patterns, and their outfits include a mix of colorful and leather jackets. Two of the men are focused on lighting cigarettes. The background reveals a bustling city atmosphere, with notable architecture including tall buildings and visible signage indicating a vibrant commercial area. The mood appears lively, reflecting a moment of everyday social interaction among the group.
title: Fountain square in downtown Cincinnati is a public square that works for the city and its people in a myriad of ways: saturday afternoon on the town
